comments.text:
10:56 <@bz> jcranmer: Now I have a tbird nntp problem
10:57 <@bz> jcranmer: so someone deleted mozilla.dev.performance
10:57 <@bz> jcranmer: so now any time I do any newsgroup op on news.mozilla.org I get a prompt asking whether I want to unsubscribe from this group that no longer exists
10:57 <@bz> jcranmer: once every 10 seconds or so
10:57 <@bz> jcranmer: so I said "screw it", and clicked "OK" to unsubscribe
10:58 <@bz> jcranmer: now every 10 seconds I get an alert saying "Would you like to subscribe to mozilla.dev.performance?"

Newsrc clearly says mozilla.dev.performance
